meanings.definition: The act of betraying someone's trust or confidence.
meanings.sent1: Her backstabbing hurt my feelings deeply.
meanings.sent2: I can't believe the backstabbing that happened in the office.
meanings.sent3: The backstabbing in the movie made the audience gasp.
meanings.sent4: The backstabbing in politics can be brutal.
meanings.sent5: The backstabbing left a lasting scar on their friendship.

meanings.sent1: The backstabbing at the poker game was unexpected.
meanings.sent2: He was caught red-handed in the act of backstabbing.
meanings.sent3: The backstabbing in the play added an element of suspense.
meanings.sent4: The backstabbing in the story was a plot twist.
meanings.sent5: The backstabbing was a dark shadow over their relationship.
